member.name: M:CmdShiftLearn.Api.Controllers.ChallengesController.GetAllChallenges
member.summary: Gets a list of all available challenges with metadata
member.remarks:
Sample response:
GET /api/challenges [ { "id": "powershell-variables", "title": "PowerShell Variables Challenge", "description": "Test your knowledge of PowerShell variables and data types.", "xp": 50, "difficulty": "Beginner", "tutorialId": "powershell-basics-1" }, { "id": "powershell-loops", "title": "PowerShell Loops Challenge", "description": "Practice using loops in PowerShell to solve problems.", "xp": 75, "difficulty": "Intermediate", "tutorialId": "powershell-basics-2" } ]
member.returns: A list of challenge metadata
member.response: Returns the list of challenges

member.name: M:CmdShiftLearn.Api.Controllers.ChallengesController.GetChallengeById(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a specific challenge by ID including its script
member.remarks:
Sample response:
GET /api/challenges/powershell-variables { "id": "powershell-variables", "title": "PowerShell Variables Challenge", "description": "Test your knowledge of PowerShell variables and data types.", "xp": 50, "difficulty": "Beginner", "tutorialId": "powershell-basics-1", "script": "# PowerShell Variables Challenge

# 1. Create a variable named $name and assign your name to it
# 2. Create a variable named $age and assign your age to it
# 3. Create a variable named $skills as an array with at least three skills
# 4. Print a message using these variables

# Your solution below:

" }
member.returns: The challenge with script
member.response: Returns the challenge
If the challenge is not found

member.name: M:CmdShiftLearn.Api.Controllers.ChallengesController.GetChallengesByTutorialId(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all challenges associated with a specific tutorial
member.remarks:
Sample response:
GET /api/challenges/by-tutorial/powershell-basics-1 [ { "id": "powershell-variables", "title": "PowerShell Variables Challenge", "description": "Test your knowledge of PowerShell variables and data types.", "xp": 50, "difficulty": "Beginner", "tutorialId": "powershell-basics-1" }, { "id": "powershell-commands", "title": "PowerShell Commands Challenge", "description": "Practice using basic PowerShell commands.", "xp": 60, "difficulty": "Beginner", "tutorialId": "powershell-basics-1" } ]
member.returns: A list of challenge metadata for the specified tutorial
member.response: Returns the list of challenges for the tutorial

member.name: M:CmdShiftLearn.Api.Controllers.DebugController.GetGitHubFiles
member.summary: Debug endpoint to list all GitHub files in the tutorials directory
member.returns: A list of file information from the GitHub repository

member.name: M:CmdShiftLearn.Api.Controllers.DebugController.GetGitHubConfig
member.summary: Debug endpoint to show GitHub configuration
member.returns: The current GitHub configuration

member.name: M:CmdShiftLearn.Api.Controllers.ShelloController.GetHint(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a hint from Shello for a specific tutorial step
member.param: Optional previous hint that was given
member.returns: A hint from Shello

member.name: M:CmdShiftLearn.Api.Controllers.TutorialsController.GetAllTutorials
member.summary: Gets a list of all available tutorials with metadata
member.remarks:
Sample response:
GET /api/tutorials [ { "id": "powershell-basics-1", "title": "PowerShell Basics: Part 1", "description": "Learn the basics of PowerShell including commands, variables, and pipelines.", "xp": 100, "difficulty": "Beginner" }, { "id": "powershell-basics-2", "title": "PowerShell Basics: Part 2", "description": "Continue learning PowerShell with functions, loops, and conditionals.", "xp": 150, "difficulty": "Beginner" } ]
member.returns: A list of tutorial metadata
member.response: Returns the list of tutorials

member.name: M:CmdShiftLearn.Api.Controllers.TutorialsController.GetTutorialById(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a specific tutorial by ID including its content
member.remarks:
Sample response:
GET /api/tutorials/powershell-basics-1 { "id": "powershell-basics-1", "title": "PowerShell Basics: Part 1", "description": "Learn the basics of PowerShell including commands, variables, and pipelines.", "xp": 100, "difficulty": "Beginner", "content": "# PowerShell Basics: Part 1

## Introduction
PowerShell is a powerful scripting language...

## Commands
$name = 'World'
Write-Host "Hello, $name!"
" }
member.returns: The tutorial with content
member.response: Returns the tutorial
If the tutorial is not found

member.name: M:CmdShiftLearn.Api.Controllers.TutorialsController.RunTutorialStep(CmdShiftLearn.Api.Models.RunTutorialStepRequest)
member.summary: Processes a user's input for a specific step in an interactive tutorial
member.param: The request containing tutorial ID, step index, and user input
member.returns: The result of processing the step
member.response: Returns the result of processing the step
If the request is invalid
If the user is not authenticated
If the tutorial or step is not found

member.name: M:CmdShiftLearn.Api.Controllers.UserProfileController.AddXp(CmdShiftLearn.Api.Controllers.AddXpRequest)
member.summary: Awards XP to the currently logged-in user
member.param: The XP request containing amount and reason
member.returns: The updated user profile with new XP and level

member.name: M:CmdShiftLearn.Api.Controllers.UserProfileController.GetUserProgress
member.summary: Marks a tutorial as completed and awards XP to the user
member.param: The tutorial completion request containing tutorialId
member.returns: The updated user profile with the completed tutorial and new XP
member.response: Returns the updated user profile
If the user is not authenticated
If the user profile or tutorial is not found
If the tutorial is already marked as completed
member.summary: Gets the user's progress including level, XP, XP leveling details, completed tutorials, completed challenges, and recent XP history
member.returns: The user's progress information
member.response: Returns the user's progress
If the user is not authenticated
If the user profile is not found

member.name: M:CmdShiftLearn.Api.Controllers.UserProfileController.ClaimDailyLoginBonus
member.summary: Claims the daily login bonus of 25 XP if not already claimed today
member.returns: The updated user profile with the daily login bonus XP
member.response: Returns the updated user profile
If the user is not authenticated
If the user profile is not found
If the daily login bonus was already claimed today

member.summary: Marks a challenge as completed and awards XP to the user
member.param: The challenge completion request containing challengeId
member.returns: The updated user profile with the completed challenge and new XP
member.response: Returns the updated user profile
If the user is not authenticated
If the user profile or challenge is not found
If the challenge is already marked as completed
